alert.note: Alert for Comerio; Corozal; Naranjito (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 05 at 5:13PM ADT until September 05 at 6:15PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Aguas Buenas, Barranquitas, Comerio, Corozal and Naranjito. * WHEN...Until 715 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 413 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Comerio, Naranjito, Barranquitas, Corozal, Aguas Buenas, Santa Clara, Palomas and Sumidero. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
